thread.title: Protections expiring this month for stolen nutrition benefits | News | salemnews.com

author: Sam Drysdale | State House News Service
title: Protections expiring this month for stolen nutrition benefits | News | salemnews.com
text:
Protections expiring this month for stolen nutrition benefits By Sam Drysdale | State House News Service Dec 17, 2024 3 hrs ago
BOSTON — A federal directive to replace stolen SNAP dollars is set to expire this month, potentially putting benefit recipients in Massachusetts and around the country at risk of completely losing out on food assistance if stolen by sophisticated skimming scams.
Skimming schemes started spiking in Massachusetts in the summer of 2022, said Victoria Negus, benefits policy advocate at the Massachusetts Law Reform Institute.
